EmailTemplate.name: Ecolab Connect Breached Resolution SLA Template
EmailTemplate.subject: URGENT: Ecolab Connect {!Case.CaseNumber} Breached Resolution SLA
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.OwnerFullName},
Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject} has been assigned to you but has not yet been resolved within the defined timeframe of our Service Level Agreement (SLA). Please resolve this case as soon as possible via the Salesforce Service Cloud Console in order to maintain our customer support and satisfaction levels.
Thank you,
Ecolab Support Team
-----
Please do not reply to this email. This is a system generated email to inform you of an Ecolab Connect Case assigned to you breaching the resolution SLA. This message was generated from https://connect.ecolab.com.
ECOLAB Global Headquarters 1 Ecolab Place, St. Paul MN 55102 Ecolab.com Privacy Policy Â© 2020 Ecolab Inc. All rights reserved.
